column2: he Plaintiff has attempted to say that there is a difference of meaning in the Sinhala Section

column1: 45(2) (b) and the English section, and therefore, the Sinhala Section must prevail. However, I
do  not  see  any  difference  in  meaning  as  both  sections,  whether  in  Sinhala  or  English,
contemplates all actions and proceedings pertaining to or related to the vested business (එකී
